get k-lite codec pack or vlc

Hi! I wonder if anyone can help me. With this file I only get audio and no video. This happens both in Zoom player and MPC. It only happens with this particular file though. I am perfectly able to play other 720 MKVs. 
Am I doing something wrong? Am I missing a setting or something? 
Thanks for any help.
Forgot to add. I'm using CCP with CoreAVC
Oh, no worries. It plays if I don't use AVC. Weird but... I'm happy if I can watch it.
